names.pinyin: niao lu pai shi tang er hao

actions: Promotes urination, unblocks painful urinary dysfunction and expels stones from the urinary tract.
Clears Heat, promotes urination, unblocks painful urinary dysfunction and expels stones.

With Jin Qian Cao, addresses all of the channels associated with painful urinary dysfunction, eliminating the causes of stone formation in the urinary tract and directly acting to expel and transform stones.
With Huan Shi and Gan Cao, for Milky Lin.
Promotes urination and clears Damp-Heat.
With Niu Xi, for Kidney Deficiency edema.
With Mu Tong and Hua Shi, for Lin Syndrome.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and relieves pain.
Promotes urination, drains Heat from the Urinary Bladder, aids the movement of gravel and stones and expels Damp-Heat.
Promotes the movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
Dredges Liver Qi, releases Stagnation, stops pain and conducts Heat out from below.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis and clears Damp-Heat in the Lower Jiao.
With Jin Qian Cao, for Stone Lin with hematuria and low back pain.
Promotes urination and unblocks painful urinary dysfunction.
With Jin Qian Cao and Hai Jin Sha, for Stone Lin.
With Che Qian Zi, for Heart Fire Transferring to the Small Intestine channel causing edema and painful urinary dysfunction.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Clear Heat
Purge Fire
Promote urination
Unblock painful urinary dysfunction
